titleStmt.title: Cambridge, Massachusetts, Harvard Law School, MS 12.

history.provenance: Provenance: Inscr. ‘Iste liber est Johannis Aslakby’, 15th c., f. 36v; Michael Dalton, d. c. 1648; William Bragge; Henry White; George Dunn.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 1024, no. 12; ELMUSA, p. 16; Michael A. Michael, ‘A Manuscript Wedding Gift from Philippa of Hainault to Edward III’, The Burlington Magazine 127 (1985): 582–99.

body.p:
Cambridge, Massachusetts, Harvard Law School
MS 12. Magna carta with statutes. 36 ff. 333 x 235 mm.
Provenance: Inscr. ‘Iste liber est Johannis Aslakby’, 15th c., f. 36v; Michael Dalton, d. c. 1648; William Bragge; Henry White; George Dunn.
Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 1024, no. 12; ELMUSA, p. 16; Michael A. Michael, ‘A Manuscript Wedding Gift from Philippa of Hainault to Edward III’, The Burlington Magazine 127 (1985): 582–99.
